frameDefinitions: A person, the Cognizer, thinks about a Topic over a period of time.
Some Stimulus causes a Cognizer to think of a prior Phenomenon due to its perceived similarity.
This frame is concerned with Cognizers remembering and forgetting mental Content.
A Cognizer retains facts in memory and is able to retrieve them.
In this frame an Agent or Cause changes the consistency of a Patient from its Initial_state to a Result.
A Cognizer calls up an episodic memory of past Experience or an Impression of a Salient_entity formed  on the basis of past experience.
frameExamples: The men were silently <t>mulling</t> <t>over</t> the proposition of committing an assassination
I burned down the malt shop where we used to go just because it <t>reminds</t> me of you
I was impressed that she 'd actually <t>remembered</t> Radish 's name (= what Radish's name is)
Donna <t>thinned</t> the soup with chicken broth.
Kozmo could <t>remember</t> when his modem was the fastest he could buy.
listRoleDefinitions: With a target verb, the Cognizer is usually expressed as an External Argument, with the Topic appearing as an Object NP, a gerundive verbal Complement, or a PP.
With a target verb, the <fen>Topic</fen> is usually expressed as an Object NP, a gerundive verbal complement, or a PP.
The time at which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> considers the <fen>Topic</fen>.
The <fen>Cognizer</fen> is the person who remembers the <fen>Phenomenon</fen> .
The <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is the mental content that a <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers.
The entity or situation that causes the <fen>Cognizer</fen> to think of the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> is when the Cognizer remembers the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
The <fen>Cognizer</fen> is the person whose mental <fen>Content</fen> is at issue.
The <fen>Content</fen> is the mental content that a <fen>Cognizer</fen> retains or forgets.
The <fen>Topic</fen> is the subject the <fen>Cognizer</fen> mental <fen>Content</fen> is about.
The <fen>Time</fen> is when the remembering or forgetting of mental <fen>Content</fen> occurs.
The <fen>Place</fen> is where the remembering or forgetting takes place.
The person who retains and retrieves information.
<fen>Mental_content</fen> stored by and accessible to the <fen>Cognizer</fen>. It may derive from experience or activity or simply from being informed of it.
The time when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> retrieves <fen>Mental_content</fen> or forgets it.
<fen>Patient</fen> is the entity that undergoes a change.
The <fen>Agent</fen> causes the change of consistency in the <fen>Patient</fen>.
The <fen>Cause</fen> is the non-<fen>Agent</fen> which brings about the change in the <fen>Patient</fen>.
When the <fen>Patient</fen> changes consistency.
Where the the <fen>Patient</fen> changes consistency.
A person who recalls memories of past experience or impressions.
A person or thing that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers as being involved in some state or event or as having some property.
A past event or state that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> witnessed and is now recalling. The <fen>Experience</fen> may be a specific event or state or a vaguer period that is treated as a unit.

A property that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> attributes to the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> based on their past experience of the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> or a category to which the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> is assigned.
A property or role that a <fen>Salient_entity</fen> actually held and which frames the memories that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has of the <fen>Salient_entity</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers the experience.
listRoleExamples: You remind me <fex>of my uncle Jerry</fex>
<fex>Internationalization</fex> conjures up a world of diplomatic exchanges and international agencies in which the interests of ex-colonial and great powers still linger
Each student must be able to recall <fex>the whole paragraph</fex>  .
I bet <fex>Johno</fex> can remember the name of the Ramones' drummer.
Do you remember <fex>how to spell cupboard ?</fex>
<fex>Afterwards</fex>, I forgot what I was pissed off about, but I was.
I will truly miss Delmar and <fex>I</fex> will always remember when his eyes lit up everytime he got ice-cream.
today I saw a sister's exclassmate, and didn't recognise him, I remember <fex>him</fex> taller.
I can still remember <fex>saying the pledge every morning before class in elementary school</fex>, a rare occurrence among elementary school kids nowadays.
I remember Peter <fex>as immensely kind in those first three weeks before I was packed off to boarding school</fex>.
Atulprasad is principally remembered <fex>as a musician and composer</fex>.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the Special Court for the Clergy
Velaayat-e Faghih [Supremacy of the Islamic Jurist
the Special Court for the Clergy
the Audio Tape of Montazeri's Discussions with the Executioners
Article 108 of the Islamic Republic Constitution
